content: ravelry https //www ravelry com/designers/sierra-and-pine instagram & facebook @sierraandpine the best part about designing knitting patterns is seeing others knit the patterns we would love to see what you make so please tag us on facebook and instagram @sierraandpine and use hashtags like #sierraandpine and #easypeasyhat pattern support through ravelry other designs you might like adventure awaits hat pine tree hat point reyes cowl for a limited time use code easypeasy at checkout and save 25% on my other designs patternby@sierraandpine foryourpersonalenjoymentonly donotsellthepattern patternsupportthroughravelry messageme@ccouturier oremailsierraandpine@gmail com 6
